item.title: Surge Phenomenon in Optimal Learning Rate and Batch Size Scaling
item.description: Deep learning’s Adam-style optimizers exhibit a surprising surge phenomenon: optimal learning rates initially increase, then decrease, before converging to a non-zero value as batch size grows.
